00048 class PlainDictionary: public Dictionary {
00049 public:
00050     PlainDictionary();
00051     PlainDictionary(unsigned int sizeHash);
00052     PlainDictionary(string path, unsigned int mapping, unsigned int separator,
00053             unsigned int nsubjects, unsigned int npredicates,
00054             unsigned int nobjects, unsigned int ssubobj);
00055     void checkTriple(string *node);
00056     unsigned int isClusterized(unsigned int id, unsigned int mode);
00057     unsigned int retrieveID(string key, unsigned int mode);
00058     string retrieveString(unsigned int id, unsigned int mode);
00059     void updateID(unsigned int id, unsigned int new_id, unsigned int mode);
00060     void beginClustering();
00061     void endClustering();
00062     void lexicographicSort(unsigned int mapping);
00063     void split();
00064     void write(string path, unsigned int separator);
00065     void dumpStats(string &path);
00066     ~PlainDictionary();
00067 protected:
00068     unsigned int sizeHash;
00069     vector<HASHREC*> predicates;
00070     vector<HASHREC*> subjects_shared;
00071     vector<HASHREC*> subjects_not_shared;
00072     vector<HASHREC*> objects_not_shared;
00073     vector<HASHREC*> cluster_subjects_shared;
00074     vector<HASHREC*> cluster_subjects_not_shared;
00075     vector<HASHREC*> cluster_objects_not_shared;
00076     HashTable hashSubject;
00077     HashTable hashPredicate;
00078     HashTable hashObject;
00079     MiniHashTable prefixes;
00080     void initialize();
00081     void map(unsigned int mapping);
00082     bool static cmpLexicographic(const struct hashrec *c1,
00083             const struct hashrec *c2) {
00084         string total_c1 = c1->word;
00085         if (c1->prefix != NULL)
00086             total_c1 = c1->prefix->word + total_c1;
00087 
00088         string total_c2 = c2->word;
00089         if (c2->prefix != NULL)
00090             total_c2 = c2->prefix->word + total_c2;
00091 
00092         if (strcmp((char*) total_c1.c_str(), (char*) total_c2.c_str()) < 0)
00093             return true;
00094         else
00095             return false;
00096     }
00097 };
